ComicInfo.Title: Pittsburgh Noir, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: So, Dean Marklin has discovered there are vampires in suburbia, and he’s found out that he’s a natural at fighting them. But is he ready for an all-out assault by some seriously crazy denizens of the night? The answer comes spinning out in this sequel to the short story from Vampires: Dracula And The Undead Legions, set in the oddly vampire-rich environment of Western Pennsylvania. Also, this issue marks the return of Moonstone’s 2007 hit Zombie-Proof as a back-up feature!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-15 23:23:54. [CVDB227109]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Brendon Fraim, Brian Fraim, Brendon Fraim, Brian Fraim
ComicInfo.Inker: Brendon Fraim, Brian Fraim, Brendon Fraim, Brian Fraim
